item0.name: Essence Reaver
item0.description:
55 Attack Damage
20% Critical Strike Chance
20 Ability Haste
  • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional (100% base Attack Damage + 40% bonus Attack Damage) physical damage and restores 40% of this damage as Mana (1.5s cooldown).

item2.name: Galeforce
item2.description:
60 Attack Damage
20% Attack Speed
20% Critical Strike Chance

Active - Cloudburst: Dash in target direction, firing three missiles at the lowest Health enemy near your destination (prioritizing champions). Deals a total of (180 - 220 (based on level) + 45% bonus Attack Damage) magic damage, increased against low Health targets by up to 50% (90s cooldown).

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 3% Move Speed

Maxiumum missile damage dealt when enemy Health is below 30%.
Cloudburst's dash cannot pass through terrain.

item3.name: Doran's Blade
item3.description:
8 Attack Damage
80 Health
  • Warmonger: Gain 2.5% Omnivamp.

    Omnivamp is only 33% effective when dealing area of effect damage or damage through pets.

item6.name: Farsight Alteration
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilities (198 - 99s cooldown).

perk0.name: Press the Attack
perk0.shortDesc: Hitting an enemy champion 3 consecutive times makes them vulnerable, dealing bonus damage and causing them to take more damage from all sources for 6s.
perk0.longDesc: Hitting an enemy champion with 3 consecutive basic attacks deals 40 - 180 bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'><font color='#48C4B7'>adaptive damage</font></lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> (based on level) and makes them vulnerable, increasing the damage they take by 8 - 12% from all sources for 6s.

item0.name: The Collector
item0.description:
55 Attack Damage
20% Critical Strike Chance
12 Lethality
  • Death and Taxes: Dealing damage that would leave an enemy champion below 5% Health executes them. Champion kills grant an additional 25 gold.

item1.name: Immortal Shieldbow
item1.description:
55 Attack Damage
20% Attack Speed
20% Critical Strike Chance
12% Life Steal
  • Lifeline: When taking damage that would reduce you below 30% Health, gain a 250 - 700 Shield for 3s. In addition, gain 15% Life Steal for 8s (90s cooldown).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Attack Damage and 50 Health.

item2.name: Executioner's Calling
item2.description:
15 Attack Damage
  • Rend: Dealing physical damage applies 40% Grievous Wounds to champions for 3 seconds.

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects on the target.

item3.name: Infinity Edge
item3.description:
70 Attack Damage
20% Critical Strike Chance
  • Perfection: If you have at least 60% Critical Strike Chance, gain 35% Critical Strike Damage.

item4.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item4.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item5.name: Muramana
item5.description:
35 Attack Damage
860 Mana
15 Ability Haste
  • Awe: Gain bonus Attack Damage equal to 2.5% max Mana.
  • Shock: When targetting champions, Ability strikes and Attacks ( On-Hit) apply an additional (2.5% max Mana) physical damage.

item6.name: Farsight Alteration
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilities (198 - 99s cooldown).

perk0.name: Arcane Comet
perk0.shortDesc: Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a damaging comet at their location.
perk0.longDesc:
Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a comet at their location, or, if Arcane Comet is on cooldown, reduces its remaining cooldown.

Adaptive Damage: 30 - 100 based on level (+0.2 AP and +0.35 bonus AD)
Cooldown: 20 - 8s

Cooldown Reduction:
Single Target: 20%.
Area of Effect: 10%.
Damage over Time: 5%.

item5.name: Control Ward
item5.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item3.name: Control Ward
item3.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.
